Class TransactionFeePreviewForRatesDTO

java.lang.Object
  nl.strohalm.cyclos.utils.DataObject
      nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transfertypes.TransactionFeePreviewDTO
          nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transfertypes.TransactionFeePreviewForRatesDTO
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class TransactionFeePreviewForRatesDTO
extends TransactionFeePreviewDTO

Extension of TransactionFeePreviewDTO, also allowing to set rates explicitly on the dto. These rates are used to calculate a preview with rates different than the account's rates.

Author:
Rinke
